medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number, and a further specification of the message type (in data element 1001: Document name code), such as Customs documents expiration notice, Customs clearance ready notice and message function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date and/or time applying to the whole message, such as date and time of document or message issue.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as: - change information

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference relating to the whole message, and its date and/or time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message, such as: - reference to previous message - container announcement reference (being the acceptance order reference number) - carrier's agent reference number

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to indicate details of the movement of containers.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to the main carriage stage of the transport (sea), such as carrier/liner service.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the date(s) and time(s) related to the main carriage stage of the transport (sea).

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference for the liner service, such as: - conference - marketing organization - syndicate - vessel sharing agreement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify a port related to the transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a port corresponding to the transport stage, such as port of loading or discharge.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date(s) and time(s) related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address, and function, such as: - message recipient - message sender - ordering customer - ordering customer agent - carrier agent (sea)

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department for the party, such as: - information contact

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to describe the goods items stuffed in containers.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment to identify a goods item stuffed in containers. A goods item can be identified by a goods item number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify documents and associated date(s) and time(s) for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document prepared for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate issue and expiry date with the prepared document.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the containers in which goods are transported.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A segment group to identify dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to specify dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify supplementary details regarding the dangerous goods such as the technical name of the dangerous goods etc.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods, such as: - net net weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A segment group to specify contact information including communication details regarding the dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to be contacted regarding the dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify communication details of the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A segment group to identify transport related temperature settings.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify the type of transport related temperature such as storage, transport or operating temperature and also to optionally specify a single value temperature setting.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to optionally specify the transport related temperature as a range of values.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify containers in which goods are transported.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify container prefix and number.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the identifying number associated with a container, such as: - container sequence number

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify a pick-up address of Customs documents.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A segment group to identify dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to specify dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify supplementary details regarding the dangerous goods such as the technical name of the dangerous goods etc.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods, such as: - net net weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A segment group to specify contact information including communication details regarding the dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to be contacted regarding the dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify communication details of the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A segment group to identify transport related temperature settings.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify the type of transport related temperature such as storage, transport or operating temperature and also to optionally specify a single value temperature setting.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to optionally specify the transport related temperature as a range of values.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to specify the number of containers in the message, explicitly given by the sender.
